lemma subterms\<^sub>s\<^sub>e\<^sub>t_subst: fixes \<theta>::"('a,'b) subst" assumes "t \<in> subterms\<^sub>s\<^sub>e\<^sub>t (M \<cdot>\<^sub>s\<^sub>e\<^sub>t \<theta>)" shows "t \<in> subterms\<^sub>s\<^sub>e\<^sub>t M \<cdot>\<^sub>s\<^sub>e\<^sub>t \<theta> \<or> (\<exists>x \<in> fv\<^sub>s\<^sub>e\<^sub>t M. t \<in> subterms (\<theta> x))"
